column1: Calculate the magnitude and determine the direction of the magnetic force on a moving charged particle in a magnetic field.
Describe the path followed by charged particles in a uniform magnetic field and relate it to centripetal force.
Describe the path followed by charged particles within the Earth's magnetic field, as well as the result of this motion.
Calculate the magnitude and determine the direction of the magnetic force on a current-carrying wire in a magnetic field.
Calculate the magnitude and direction of the force between two current carrying wires.
Describe how magnetic dipoles orient in the presence of a magnetic field due to non-zero torque.
Classify magnetic materials as paramagnetic, diamagnetic, or ferromagnetic, based on their response to a magnetic field
